name: incessancy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being incessant (= never stopping): incessancy of He had been away for four months and was exhausted by the incessancy of the touring circuit. She was exasperated by the sheer incessancy of my energy.
More examplesFewer examplesIt's just the incessancy of it, when they leave hundreds of messages on your phone.They found the incessancy of the workload too much, going straight from one project to the next. From this viewpoint in the city centre, what you notice is the incessancy of high-rises.
